page.title: 12HENLLAN VIEWS
page.content:
IN PRAISE:
'Everybody knows everybody else' 'A quiet peaceful healthy village with easy access to the coast, mountains and towns' 'A thorough mix of ages and languages'
CRITICISM:
'Stray dogs' 'Too few buses to the local towns' 'Dangerous main road in village centre 'Anglicisation of village due to unnecessary expansion'
CONCERNS ABOUT SOCIETY:
'Unemployment' 'Football hooliganism' 'Lack of respect for property/person' 'Lack of discipline''Lack of trust' 'Drugs''Nuclear war''Education cuts'
